event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: presses the opposition building out of the back, forces an errant pass

players_involved.name: Claire Briggs
players_involved.action: adds pressure, picks up the loose ball in the attacking third and takes a shot on goal

players_involved.name: Corrie Green
players_involved.action: wins the tackle to help win possession

narrative: {Caroline} pressures the opposition as they try to build out of the back â€” forces an errant pass. {Claire Briggs} and {Corrie Green} stay aggressive, {Corrie Green} wins the tackle, and {Claire Briggs} picks up the ball in space in the attacking third and fires a shot on goal saved by the keeper.
caption_hook: Press. Win. Shoot. That's the energy.
